name: Grilled Vegetables with Balsamic Vinegar
author: Natasha
summary: A simple recipe for vegetables that let's their quality and freshness shine through! A variety of other vegetables (cut at least 1/2-inch thick) can be used with this recipe such as: mushrooms, onions, squash, and red peppers.
ingredients: 2 medium green bell peppers, cut into 1/2-inch slices
directions: Whisk olive oil, soy sauce, balsamic vinegar, salt, and pepper in a large bowl
Toss eggplants, zucchinis, and bell peppers in soy sauce marinade
Preheat grill for medium heat and lightly oil the grate
Remove vegetables from marinade, shaking off excess
Grill vegetables on preheated grill until tender, 10 to 15 minutes, brushing vegetables with marinade
Transfer cooked vegetables to a platter and serve with any remaining marinade
